netCoreEnvironment.description: The type of hosting environment the service must provide

sqlDbUser.description: The User Id that the application will use to connect to the SQL (MySQL for this application) database

sqlDbPassword.description: The password that the application will use to connect to the SQL (MySQL for this application) database

auth0Tenant.description: auth0Tenant is the auth0 tenant domain name used to instantiate the DOMAINNAME_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for all deployed instances of noon applications

auth0ManagementClientIdDari.description: auth0ManagementClientId is the auth0 management API client application's Client ID that will be used to instantiate the CLIENT_ID_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the dari version of the service

auth0ManagementClientSecretDari.description: auth0ManagementClientSecret is the auth0 management API client application's Client Secret that will be used to instantiate the CLIENT_SECRET_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the dari version of the service

auth0ManagementAudienceDari.description: auth0ManagementAudience is the auth0 management API's Audience value that will be used to instantiate the AUDIENCE_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the dari version of the service

auth0ManagementClientIdPashto.description: auth0ManagementClientIdPashto is the auth0 management API client application's Client ID that will be used to instantiate the CLIENT_ID_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the pashto version of the service

auth0ManagementClientSecretPashto.description: auth0ManagementClientSecretPashto is the auth0 management API client application's Client Secret that will be used to instantiate the CLIENT_SECRET_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the pashto version of the service

auth0ManagementAudiencePashto.description: auth0ManagementAudiencePashto is the auth0 management API's Audience value that will be used to instantiate the AUDIENCE_ENVIRONMENT system environment variable for the pashto version of the service

smtpServerEmailAddress.description: smtpServerEmailAddress is the email address from which the smtp server will send out emails
